Package org.fcrepo.serialization

This package provides serialization capability.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FedoraObjectSerializer
    Interface for serializing/deserializing a FedoraObject to some transportable format
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseFedoraObjectSerializer
    Auto-wire some helpful services for the FedoraObjectSerializer
    JcrXmlSerializer
    Serialize a FedoraObject using the modeshape-provided JCR/XML format
    SerializerUtil
    Helper service that aggregates serializers and makes them accessible by key
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidSerializationFormatException
    Exception thrown when during deserialization it becomes obvious that the InputStream is not in the expected format.

Package org.fcrepo.serialization Description

This package provides serialization capability. A FedoraObject can be serialized to an XML stream. A FedoraObjectSerializer is responsible for the serialization mechanism.
Author:
osmandin
